sqlroot.sql: UPDATE T_BRIDGE_CHAT SET STATUS = 1 WHERE UUID = :uuid

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.ID, C.UUID, C.FROM_USERNAME, C.TO_USERNAME, C.CHAT_TYPE, T.DATA, 0 AS FILE_NAME, 0 AS FILE_SIZE, 0 AS FILE_MD5 FROM T_BRIDGE_CHAT C JOIN T_BRIDGE_TEXT T ON T.ID = C.ID WHERE C.STATUS = 0 AND C.TO_USERNAME = :to UNION SELECT C.ID, C.UUID, C.FROM_USERNAME, C.TO_USERNAME, C.CHAT_TYPE, 0 AS DATA, F.FILE_NAME, F.FILE_SIZE, F.FILE_MD5 FROM T_BRIDGE_CHAT C JOIN T_BRIDGE_FILE F ON F.ID = C.ID WHERE C.STATUS = 0 AND C.TO_USERNAME = :to ) T ORDER BY ID
